New Records: Harry Wilson is the first Welshman to score in three successive games for his country since Gareth Bale at Euro 2016.
Key Match Events: Harry Wilson scored the only goal of the game in Cardiff.
Nathan Broadhead squandered a late chance to double their lead when he got his feet caught up trying to go around the keeper.
Andrija Radulovic hammered a long-range rocket off the crossbar.
Pre-Game Insights: Top spot in the group will be on the line when Wales travel to Turkey on Nov. 16.
Post-Match Reflections: Wales, unbeaten under Bellamy after four matches, controlled the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales forward Harry Wilson was rewarded for a fine all-round performance when he converted a penalty to secure a 1-0 victory over Montenegro.
The attendance at the Cardiff City Stadium was 27,326.
Others: The match was part of the 2024-25 UEFA Nations League, Group Stage.
